name: [G.O.A.T] Game of Absolute Trajectory
description:
G.O.A.T is an acronym for Game of Absolute Trajectory and as the title suggests, that's what this game is all about.  Take control of a "Jumper" and make your way through the game jumping from one circle's orbit to the next. 

      The LITE (Vanilla)  version gives the player a small glimpse into the Vanilla mode of the game in which the jumpers' orbit speed will increase with every 10  successful jumps.  Hone in your Hand-Eye coordination as well as reaction speed while you attempt to set unthinkable scores as you jump through this endless procedurally generated gauntlet.

     The PRO version upgrade gives the player access to custom jumper colors, changeable world environments, and three more game modes:

     Casual: Make your way through the world without the worry of increasing orbit speed.  The circles that spawn are also constrained to a separate set of radii that will not allow tiny circles to spawn, therefore making for a more relaxed playstyle.

     Looper: Circles have a limited number of orbits, line yourself up with the next circle and jump before the timer runs out and the circle implodes, ending your streak.

     Custom: Take complete control over your gameplay experience. Adjust minimum and maximum circle radius parameters,  Capture radius ( how close you have to be to the circle to land), and Orbit speed. Play the game how you like it and set a score that can't be matched.
